title: I'm Married To An Escort
itunes:title: I'm Married To An Escort
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for almost 2 years and I met my wife on a dating website. She was the most beautiful girl I’d ever seen and when we met in person, we quickly fell in love. I came with a little baggage and she admitted that she did too. We are in our mid-forties, so we agreed that our past was the past so that’s where we’d leave it. She works as a guest service manager at an elite country club, so I can golf at the club for free....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
